title: Select "Random warp" = y, Model Summary says "random_warp : False"
body:
## Expected behavior

Running pretraining, liae-ud, 256x64x64x22
answered "Enable random warp of samples" first with "?" to get help, then with "y" to enable
I expect the model summary during training to then say "random_warp : True".

## Actual behavior

Model summary during training says "random_warp : False".

Output:

```
Enable random warp of samples ( y/n ?:help ) : ?
Random warp is required to generalize facial expressions of both faces. When the face is trained enough, you can disable it to get extra sharpness and reduce subpixel shake for less amount of iterations.
[y] Enable random warp of samples ( y/n ?:help ) :
y
[0.0] GAN power ( 0.0 .. 10.0 ?:help ) :
0.0

0.0

0.0

none
[n] Enable gradient clipping ( y/n ?:help ) :
n
[y] Enable pretraining mode ( y/n ?:help ) :
y
```
